job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to developing software using a specific platform (OutSystems), which falls under traditional software development.
This describes the nature of software development being performed, indicating a focus on building applications.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses exclusively on software development using the OutSystems low-code platform. There are no mentions of AI/ML tasks, models, or related specializations. Therefore, it is classified as a Software Engineer role.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about the required skills and technologies, which are entirely focused on low-code software development using OutSystems. There is no ambiguity regarding AI/ML involvement.
